articles.title: 'Shang Chi' Simu Liu does bhangra on stage, sings Jalebi Baby with Tesher. Watch - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Tesher performed his hit single Jalebi Baby at the Juno Awards in Toronto and was joined by host Simu Liu. The two did some bhangra together and sang the song.
articles.content: Canadian singer Tesher and actor Simu Liu did some bhangra together to the beats of the former's hit single Jalebi Baby on stage at the Juno Awards in Toronto. Indian origin singer Tesher, originally… [+1648 chars]
